description: This is a test module for the FastAPI authentication registration endpoint. It contains functions to set up a fresh FastAPI app environment with environment variables, and test functions to verify user registration, token issuance, and handling of duplicate emails.

methods.name: _fresh_app_with_env(tmp_db_path: str)
methods.description: Sets environment variables for database URL, JWT secret, and environment, then reloads the FastAPI app by importing the main module after clearing relevant cached modules.

methods.name: test_register_creates_user_and_returns_token(tmp_path)
methods.description: Tests user registration endpoint for successful registration, token return, and token type correctness.

methods.name: test_register_duplicate_email_returns_400(tmp_path)
methods.description: Tests the registration endpoint's behavior when attempting to register with an already used email, expecting a 400 error response.
